entry.title: "Penny" [Damian Wayne x reader]
entry.summary:
Author: Emma_ghsjixv

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 73,659Chapters: 14/?Kudos: 882

Summary: "Listen. I'm the son of Batman. When he'll die, everything of his will be mine, and that includes BEING Batman. And if you're Pennyworth's apprentice, that means you'll be MY Pennyworth. So you better start ahead of time and help me.""A-Alright.""Good. Let's go Penny.""Penny???"
